titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1) to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide for the renewal of the quality of the Nation's waters, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-2.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1 (water pollution control).
